column5: 10. Really cool names -Khabibulin 9. Facewashes 8. A trophy named after a dead guy named Lord Stanley. 7. Gary Thorne 6. The best dressed head coaches in all professional sports 5. Only guys with facial hair are eligible to play 4. The Canadian beer commercials 3. It requires a machine called a Zamboni 3. Only sport where the player's equipment may also be used as a weapon 2. Crosschecking opposing player into his bench 1. Triple sudden death overtime only extends my drinking time.
